hero.title: INDIAESQUE
hero.subtitle: Unique stays, offbeat places and independent experiences

sections.title: Ethos
sections.content:
India has never been a place you can fully "cover."

It shifts. Expands. Reinvents itself constantly.

New stays open quietly. Neighbourhoods evolve. Independent spaces emerge outside the spotlight.

Indiaesque exists to curate what's worth discovering — city by city.

We are an editorial travel platform spotlighting unique stays, offbeat places, and experiences that go beyond the obvious. We don't aim to list everything. We focus on what stands out.

sections.title: What We Do
sections.content:
Indiaesque documents:

- Design-led and boutique stays
- Hidden neighbourhoods
- Local food discoveries
- Cultural experiences
- Independent spaces shaping modern India

Our guides evolve as India does — updated as new discoveries emerge.

### What We're Not

- We're not a travel agency. 
- We don't sell packages. 
- We don't push itineraries.

We act as a filter — highlighting places and experiences we believe deserve attention.

highlights.title: Some content may include partnerships or affiliate links. When it does, it’s clearly indicated.
If you book through our links, we may earn a small commission — it helps keep Indiaesque running (and occasionally buys us a coffee).
It never increases the price you pay.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.content: Have a question about an experience? Want to suggest something we should check out? We'd love to hear from you.
